duties_responsibilities.duty: Investigate instances of theft, employee misconduct, and workplace violations within the proprietary and contingent workforce, in compliance with local, state, and federal laws, and company policies.
Write comprehensive investigative reports and provide testimonials regarding incidents and processes/tools utilized.
Assist in complex investigations and provide workplace-related support for other company functions.
Conduct on-site security risk assessments, document findings, and present recommendations to appropriate business units.
Represent the Corporate Physical Security on various committees and working groups, providing guidance and expertise on physical security matters as needed.
Administer physical security programs and facilitate security-related training to employees.
Prepare and document investigations for hand off to Human Resources, Legal, or law enforcement agencies.
Handle multiple types of investigations including Employee Misconduct, Theft, and Workplace Issues.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in a related field (Master's preferred)
